name: Ar-Raheeq-Al-Makhtum - Biography of the Muhammad ï·º
description: The app features the award winning book on the Biography of Prophet Muhammad  Ar-Raheeq Al-Makhtum The Sealed Nectar. Ar-Raheeq Al-Makhtum (in Arabic/Urdu: , The Sealed Nectar) is a biography of Muhammad  by Safiur Rahman Mubarakpuri. The book was originally written in Arabic and Urdu.  App Features:  Beautiful User Interface Easy Navigation Customize-able Font and Font Size Light And Dark Theme Go to Last Read Topic Go to Specific Topic by Number Share Topic Unlimited Bookmarks  Do read and benefit from this app insha Allah and help us spread the message of Islam to as many people as possible.  Also, do give your feedback about the app.  Jazk Allhu Khayran
